entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 10:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with snow late this afternoon. Fog patches developing near noon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
